name: GEIE European Family Businesses
goal: European Family Businesses is the EU federation of national associations representing long-term family owned enterprises, including small, medium-sized and larger companies. EFB’s mission is to press for policies that recognise the fundamental contribution of family businesses in Europe’s economy and create a level playing field when compared to other types of companies.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Taxation, Entrepreneurship, SME policy, Industrial Policy, Competition, Economy, Innovation and Research, Education etc...
